A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I can't believe this script made it past anyone\, an actor\, producer\, the janitor\, anyone.  Every single commanding member of the resistance were imbeciles.  No one did anything that mattered\, and the scale of a movie that claims to be 'war' was laughable.  DO NOT SEE THIS\, DON'T LET IT RUIN A PREVIOUSLY GREAT FRANCHISE.
